# The `InsertValueInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This instruction inserts a struct field of array element value into an aggregate value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InsertValueInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This instruction inserts a struct field of array element value into an aggregate value.

### InsertValueInst() {#a1a14aba2b73db7b25756c66a20e010b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::InsertValueInst::InsertValueInst (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Agg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; unsigned &gt; Idxs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; NameStr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Constructors - Create a insertvalue instruction with a base aggregate value, a value to insert, and a list of indices.

The first and second ctor can optionally insert before an existing instruction, the third appends the new instruction to the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l02496">2496</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
